actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend the Foreign Trades Zones Act to renew the existing customs exemption applicable to bicycle parts not reexported in foreign trade zones.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Trade Zones Act to extend until December 31, 1996 (currently January 1, 1991) the exclusion of bicycle component parts from the exemption from customs laws provided by such Act.

titles.title: To amend the Foreign Trades Zones Act to renew the existing customs exemption applicable to bicycle parts not reexported in foreign trade zones.
